Name: Horned Sister
Traits: Innate Spellcasting. The horned sister's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). The horned sister is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks).
